org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist
Interface FormRowHandler<K,R>

All Superinterfaces:
RowHandler<K,R>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFormRowHandler, IndividualFormRowHandler, InMemoryFormRowHandlerDecorator, ValidOnlyFormRowHandler, ValidOnlyIndividualBeanFormRowHandler, ValidOnlyIndividualFormRowHandler
public interface FormRowHandler<K,R>
extends RowHandler<K,R>

This class represents the callback interface provided by the programmer to the FormListWidget. This callback allows to respond form list events. The generic parameter K corresponds to the type of the key values, and the generic parameter R corresponds to the type of the row values.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)

Method Detail

initFormRow

void initFormRow(FormRow<K,R> formRow,
                 R row)
                 throws Exception
The underlying implementation should initialize (e.g. setting the correct open/close status) the editable row ( formRow)) that represents the given row model object. This method is usually called when building the form.

Parameters:
formRow - The editable row to initialize.
row - The row data object that the editable row represents.
Throws:
Exception

initAddForm

void initAddForm(FormWidget addForm)
                 throws Exception
The underlying implementation should initialize the form that will be used to add new rows.

Parameters:
addForm - An instance of form that will be used to add new rows to the list.
Throws:
Exception

addRow

void addRow(FormWidget addForm)
            throws Exception
This method is called when a new row was ordered to be added. The row data should be read from the supplied form (after converting and validating).

Parameters:
addForm - The form that will be used to add new rows.
Throws:
Exception

saveRows

void saveRows(Map<K,FormRow<K,R>> formRows)
              throws Exception
This method is called when the specified form rows were ordered to be saved to a file, database, etc.

Parameters:
formRows - A map of row keys that correspond to appropriate FormRows to be saved.
Throws:
Exception

deleteRows

void deleteRows(Set<K> keys)
                throws Exception
This method is called when the rows (specified by the keys in the supplied set) should be deleted.

Parameters:
keys - A set of row keys that correspond to form rows that were ordered to be deleted.
Throws:
Exception

openOrCloseRow

void openOrCloseRow(FormRow<K,R> formRow)
                    throws Exception
This method is called when the supplied row has been opened or closed. You can check current status of formRow by invoking FormRow.isOpen().

Parameters:
formRow - The editable form row that was opened or closed.
Throws:
Exception
